main.title: an old home
main.body: the house stands strong, despite the world's decay. the roof, though coated in the soot that layers everything, has no holes. someone could even be still living here.

living.title: the living room
living.body: passing through the threshold it becomes clear the family who once lived here is long gone. pictures of smiling people are partially covered by long-settled dust. there's footprints in the dust on the floor, though. someone came through here not too long ago.

back.title: the back room
back.body: there's a television hanging from the wall, and a video is displayed on it. the power source is indeterminable. the video is only a few seconds long, looping constantly, and features a human in a clean suit, standing behind a podium. he talks briefly before being cut off by the loop.... by them. children are a dangerous sink for valuable and limited resources, and cause the lower classes to suffer further when a baby is born. for many, a child is a curse, not a gift. due to the controversy behind ... the video loops again. there's a closet in the corner of this room.

closet.title: the closet
closet.body: there's a single cardboard box on the ground with some stuff inside.

box.title: a cardboard box
box.body: the box has been slightly folded with fresh creases. someone's looked inside already.
box.visitedBody: in spite of the dying world, the box is clean, and still might have something left.
